---
title: Slurm job
---

A simple Slurm job example.

```sh
#!/bin/bash -l
#SBATCH -J MyTestJob
#SBATCH -N 1
#SBATCH -p defq
#SBATCH --output=MyTestJobResult.out
#SBATCH --error=MyTestJobResult.err

echo "== Starting run at $(date)"
echo "== Job ID: ${SLURM_JOBID}"
echo "== Node list: ${SLURM_NODELIST}"
echo "== Submit dir: ${SLURM_SUBMIT_DIR}"
echo "== Scratch dir: ${TMPDIR}"

# Move to scratch space
cd "$TMPDIR"

# Run your application (example: print hostname)
echo "== Running on: $(hostname)"
echo "== Job completed at $(date)"
```
